Name: 流浪荒岛
About the game: Thrilling battles Wandering Desert Island features powerful bosses, dangerous dungeons, and monsters spawning in different island biomes. You can match weapons and equipment to unlock powerful skills to slash, block, tumble and destroy these monsters to survive! Classic sandbox survival gameplay Farming and fishing, cutting down trees and digging for mines, building huts, these are all indispensable. However, you don't need pickaxes and axes to sabotage here, an iron sword is enough. Unlock and grow technology Technology changes lives, and with these technologies, you can upgrade your home. Expanded lighting, rapid watering, resource regeneration... Explore the island and visit NPCs Not all islands are deserted, and some are inhabited by residents! Deal with the residents and trade goods with them. Each island has unique creatures and resources to explore.
